GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (WOOD) Police are searching for the driver involved in a deadly hit-and-run crash in Grand Rapids Wednesday night.

articles.title: Final decision on Johnson & Johnson's vaccine candidate expected soon by FDA - KOMO News
articles.description: WASHINGTON -- Johnson & Johnson's single-dose vaccine offers strong protection against severe COVID-19, according to an analysis released Wednesday by U. S. regulators. An advisory committee will meet Friday to review the vaccine's data and vote to recommend …

articles.title: County moves date for new vaccination group up to Saturday - FOX 5 San Diego
